response.overview: On November 3rd GCW: Please, Buddy is live on FITE+ straight from Pop's NightClub & Concert Venue in Sauget, IL. The event features the GCW World Title Match where Blake Christian defends his title against Warhorse.  Also in the lineup  Three Way Match  Jordan Oliver vs Man Like DeReiss vs Alec Price  Dan The Dad vs Santana Jackson  Tag Team Match  Violence Is Forever (Dominic Garrini & Kevin Ku) vs Team Bussy (Allie Katch & Effy)  Six Man Tag Team Match  Jimmy Lloyd & Los Macizos (Ciclope & Miedo Extremo) vs The Second Gear Rejects (1 Called Manders, John Wayne Murdoch & Mance Warner)  Tag Team Match  Bang And Matthews (August Matthews & Davey Bang) vs Bullet Club War Dogs (Alex Coughlin & Gabe Kidd)  Tag Team Match  Charli Evans & Everett Connors vs Deathmatch Royalty (Matt Cardona & Steph De Lander)  Alex Shelley vs Masha Slamovich  Gringo Loco vs Mike Bailey  Shazza McKenzie vs Maki Itoh
response.title: GCW Please, Buddy
